hcc_text: Slosson Avenue is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top 10% for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in Staten Island)
info: At Slosson Avenue at Staten Island Exwy Wb Exit 12 and Reon Avenue, there were 3 injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Slosson Avenue at Staten Island Exwy Wb Exit 12 and Reon Avenue
